trans-unit.source: Represents the pager row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示中的頁面巡覽區列<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the FormViewPagerRow is created to hold the pager controls in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: FormViewPagerRow 的執行個體是用來保存在的頁面巡覽區控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> interface is a marker that indicates that the FormViewPagerRow control is part of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object's control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>介面是一個標記，表示 FormViewPagerRow 控制項的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>物件的控制項階層架構。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>

trans-unit.source: This class is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: Control developers can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CreateRow%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InitializePager%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> class to create a custom pager row.
trans-unit.target: 控制項開發人員可以覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A>建構函式和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CreateRow%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InitializePager%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>類別來建立自訂的頁面巡覽區的資料列。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InitializePager%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CreateRow%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The FormViewPagerRow constructor calls the base class constructor, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.%23ctor%2A>, with the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: FormViewPagerRow 建構函式呼叫的基底類別建構函式， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.%23ctor%2A>，使用指定的參數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow> control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control, the call is made `rowType` equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> and `rowState` equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow>控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項，呼叫`rowType`等於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>和`rowState`等於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 中的資料列的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項。
